name: Super Marios Bros
description:
This is "Super Marios Bros", a game I made in 12 days with Unity.

You control an italian plumber that tries its best to rescue his lovely princess.

Also its multiplayer. (Up to 20 players at the same time)

Also the game is gamepad compatible.

CONTROLS

A/D/Arrows : Move Left and Right

Space : Jump

F (Fire Mario) : Shoots Fire Ball

R (If you are stuck) : Teleports towards begin of level (Costs 2.000pts)

CHEAT CODES

Enter/Return (Host) : Skips to next level instantly

HOW I MADE THE GAME

(Coming soon on my youtube channel)
